summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account for the period of July 1, 2015, to July 31, 2015. It details the account balance, deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and provides instructions for addressing discrepancies in transactions.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, 345 Park Avenue, New York, New York, 10154
keyFacts: The account balance as of July 31, 2015, was $139,471.98.
There were no significant transactions during the statement period, with only service charges and fees noted.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in transactions within specified time frames.
The document is marked as confidential and pertains to financial transactions.
There are references to NSF (non-sufficient funds) fees, but none were charged during this statement period.
